I don't think I'll ever let a gorgeous purple cocktail go without reposting it. This one's from @cocktailpete *** Advertisement / reklame

Is it a Martini ? I will let the cocktail police decide üç∏ I choose to call it "Butterfly" because the use of Butterfly pea infused gin üîÆ here I went in with Tanqueray gin which holds 47.3% ABV as the base, and infused it with butterfly pea flowers üîÆ pairred it up with white vermouth üòã added floral notes to it with the use of creme violet üîµ and elderflower liqueur üå∏ serving up this sweeter floral version of a martini üç∏ enjoy

The üçπ Butterfly

60 ml BP flower infused gin
15 ml white vermouth
10 ml creme de violette
1 bsp elderflower liqueur

Stir all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice üßä untill preferred dillution is reached üí¶ strain into a chilled / frozen glass ü•∂ garnish with lemon peel üçã and a cocktail pick

Cheers ü•Ç Sk√•l

A while back I re-posted a blue cheese martini from @thebitterfairy that she made using blue cheese fat-washed gin following a procedure from @cocktailsmandurah . I finally made good on my promise to try it myself and I was NOT disappointed. This is fantastic, and I highly recommend it.

3pt gin (check out @cocktailsmandurah for how to make it)
1pt dry vermouth
Splash of olive brine

Add ingredients. Add ice. Stir. Strain. Garnish. I used olives, blue cheese, and (since I was feeling a bit peckish) a piece of a pepperoni stick.

#martini #bluecheese #sexygarnish #vermouth #gin #cocktails #drinks #MixedDrinks #Mixology #HomeBartender #HomeMixology #HappyHour #cheers #sk√•l #Alcohol #liquor #liqueur

You know I'm getting back into the mixology groove when I have random jars sitting around making syrups and the like. This one here is a citrus cordial. I got the recipe from @selmasaur and I'm super excited to give it a try.

In her book "Spirit of the North", Selma writes:
1 C freshly-squeezed lemon juice
1 C freshly-squeezed orange juice
1 C superfine sugar

Mix well until sugar is completely dissolved, than add the peels of the oranges and lemons used for juicing. Let sit overnight at a minimum, with the peels of the oranges and lemons, but up to 2 days for the perfect yield. Strain before use.

#orange #lemon #cordial #citrus #norse #cocktailsyrup #cocktails #drinks #MixedDrinks #Mixology #HomeBartender #HomeMixology #HappyHour #cheers #sk√•l #Alcohol #liquor #liqueur

HAPPY NEW YEAR from @chemistry.cocktails !! Here's hoping that 2021 brings everyone joy, happiness, and cheer. If you need a use for any leftover champagne from last night, how about mixing up a mimosa? This one is prepared with cranberry juice which is my preferred method.

Just add juice and champagne to a chilled flute and enjoy!

#NYE #newyear #2021 #champagne #mimosa #cranberry #cocktails #drinks #MixedDrinks #Mixology #HomeBartender #HomeMixology #HappyHour #cheers #sk√•l #Alcohol #liquor #liqueur

Some days you're just flipping through Instagram, looking for inspiration, and find just the thing! I'm always on the lookout for gin drinks, and I love brandy. This is reposted from @theweekendmixologist
 ***
A M P E R S A N D
1 oz Old Tom Gin
1 oz Armagnac
1 oz Sweet Vermouth
¬º oz Orange Liqueur
1 Dash Orange Bitters
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and then add ice. Stir and strain into your cocktail glass and garnish with a twist.
-
Here is an old Martini riff that adds some depth with Brandy (I used Armagnac) and Orange liqueur. The name is possibly a nod to the & in between the Martini & Rossi vermouth that was popular for martinis at the time.
Try this one out! Cheers!
.
#Ampersand #Armagnac #Cognac *** #regrann

My mother always taught me to be sure to eat my fruits and vegetables. ...do you think this mango daiquiri from @niclimdrinks counts? ü§î
***
 Check out my mango daiquiri. Muddled a few slices of mango, add in the rest of the ingredients and boom, delicious tasting tropical daiquiri. I've done a strawberry and now mango daiquiri, what fruit should I do next? 

Mango Daiquiri:
60 ml Light Rum 
15 ml Lime Juice
23 ml Simple Syrup
1/4 Mango (cut to slices)

Maybe one day I'll invest in the ability to get amazing shots like this, until then, I'll just be jealous of others. This one is from @garnish_girl

***
Garnishing a cocktail with a twist makes all the difference in the world, and in the right light you can see why. ‚ÄúTwist‚Äù doesn‚Äôt refer to the curly shape of the peel, it‚Äôs what you should be doing to the peel over your drink to expel all those flavorful, aromatic oils. Ever since seeing @highproofpreacher‚Äôs amazing photos of this, I‚Äôve always wanted to capture my own. I finally invested in some professional photography lighting and was able to get this shot. Hoping to continue improving! Thanks to @highproofpreacher for the #hitmewithyourzestshot inspiration and for sharing his knowledge and experience on his website - there are some great photography guides on there! @barrelageddad is another pro who has given great advice on getting these shots as well.
.
Boston Brahmin (again):
1 oz. aged rum (@bullyboybooze Rum Collective vol. 1)
1 oz. sweet vermouth
3/4 oz. Campari
1/4 oz. @giffardusa Banane du Bresil
Stir with ice and strain over one large ice cube. Expel approximately 60 orange twists over the drink until you get the perfect photo. üôåüèªüì∑
.
.
.

It's been particularly cold in Aarhus recently, so I mixed up this island classic. I substituted the more traditional sherry for leftover champagne from NYE. ...ladies and gentlemen, 'The Fogcutter'

1 pt gin
1 pt brandy
1 pt rum
2 pt orange juice
1 pt lemon juice
¬æ pt orgeat
¬º pt champagne

Add ingredients (except champagne) to ice. Shake. Pour into a glass filled with ice. Top with champagne. Garnish with an orange wheel and a little umbrella.

#TikiDrinks #fogcutter #brandy #gin #rum #orgeat #orange #champagne #islandfeel #cocktails #drinks #MixedDrinks #Mixology #HomeBartender #HomeMixology #HappyHour #cheers #sk√•l #Alcohol #liquor #liqueur

Here's a great post from @erbsiscocktails ... I think I need to buy some strawberries.
***

Ta-daa! First drink with my strawberry infused Campari had to be a Strawberry Negroni for sure. Did you already guess that?

I‚Äôve seen it first @barfaith last year, but somehow didn‚Äôt make it. Well, I will imbibe twice as much this year. üòÇ Very delicious!

STRAWBERRY NEGRONI 
30 ml gin (I used @thedukegin)
30 ml strawberry infused Campari 
30 ml sweet vermouth

Stir, strain over a clear ice cube and garnish with a strawberry rose. *strawberry infusion: Cut strawberries in thick slices (about three/four per strawberry), put into a sealable jar, fill with Campari to cover the berries, let infuse in the fridge for 3-5 days. 
#cocktails #drinks #negroni #gin #homebartender #mixology #infused #cocktailhour #campari #strawberries #stirred *** #regrann

Well, it's getting chilly out there, so I've started experimenting with warm cocktails. Here's a great one from @forcocktailsake ***
 ~J&B Rare Floral Tea Toddy~
üíê
#ad #jandbwhisky

Your iced tea just got an upgrade for winter and it is comforting, delicious and a delight for cosy nights in. I‚Äôve been loving playing with hot cocktails. Hot toddy‚Äôs, coffee cocktails and now it‚Äôs time for tea... pinky up, grab a bottle J&B Rare Whisky - A bottle steeped in history since 1749 with its intricately blended whiskies, makes it great for your winter cocktails. ‚Ä®
~J&B Rare Floral Tea Toddy~
üíê

40ml @jbrarewhisky ‚Ä®
20ml Lemon Juice‚Ä®
15ml Hibiscus & Rose petal & Honey Syrup

Shake to combine.

Add to tea cup. 

Top with hot Jasmine Green Flowering Tea.

Serve with a slice of lemon and dried roses.

*Syrup: a small handful of hibiscus and rose petals added to 1/2 cup of caster sugar, 1tbl honey and 1 cup of water. Leave to simmer for 10minutes. Leave to cool and bottle ready for cocktails.

If you love a cuppa and a dram, then it‚Äôs time to SAVE this for the next time you feel like a hot cocktail. Shout (comment below) if you need more suggestions for hot whisky or tea cocktails üòâ
‚Ä®Grab a bottle of J&B Rare Whisky @waitroseandpartners 

üçπ @forcocktailsake

With the corona issue decreasing, we finally got a chance to go out and get some cocktails! Here's an absolutely phenomenal amaretto sour I had. @fourrosesbourbon @disaronno_official

My Italian friends, @bertuzzigiulio and @tnt_acme , had me over for pasta carbonara the other night. When I found out that they only use the yolks and discard the whites, I almost lost it! ...the next time, we made use of the whites in a couple Ramos Gin Fizzes and some Whiskey Sours. ...it was a fantastic night!

This concoction is a black pepper strawberry shrub. I got the recipe from @foodrepublic . It has a really nice balance and I've found a ton of fun uses. I actually made this batch back when strawberries were in season and froze it so I could enjoy some summer flavors this winter.

3/4 cup chopped ripe strawberries
3 tablespoons sugar
1 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper
1 cup white balsamic vinegar

Add everything except vinegar and let macerate for 30 min. Add vinegar and let sit in the fridge for 2 days. Strain and enjoy.

#strawberries #pepper #blackpepper #shrub #vinegar #cocktails #drinks #MixedDrinks #Mixology #HomeBartender #HomeMixology #HappyHour #cheers #sk√•l #Alcohol #liquor #liqueur

I've been away from the game for a while, but I'm going to try to change that. And what better day to celebrate my return than Repeal Day?! On this day, in 1933, the United States government repealed the prohibition of alcohol. I chose a proper prohibition-era drink to honor this occasion: The Sidecar

2pt cognac
1pt @cointreau 
1pt lemon juice
1pt simple syrup

Add ingredients over ice. Mix. Rinse a coupe glass with orange bitters. Strain cocktail into glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

#cognac #orange #sidecar #speakeasy #prohibition #RepealDay #cocktails #drinks #MixedDrinks #Mixology #HomeBartender #HomeMixology #HappyHour #cheers #sk√•l #Alcohol #liquor #liqueur #classiccocktails

When I saw the 'Bramdy Alexander' that @mdosterling posted, I started getting a craving. I didn't have any cr√®me de cocoa, so I improvised with @disaronno_official . Since this drink has an Italian twist, I call it a 'Brandy Alessandro'. It may not be the MOST Christmas-y cocktail, but it works. Merry Christmas from all of us here at @chemistry.cocktails

2 oz Brandy
2 oz cream
1 oz Disaronno

Add ingredients over ice. Shake. Strain. Garnish with a nutmeg sprinkling and cinnamon stick.

#christmas #brandy #cream #cocktails #drinks #MixedDrinks #Mixology #HomeBartender #HomeMixology #HappyHour #cheers #sk√•l #Alcohol #liquor #liqueur #originaldrink #mydrink #Cocktailmaking #liqpic #ttcocktails #EmpireMixology #DelightfulDrinks #asthebarflies

I love testing out mocktails and adding them to my repertoire. They're fun and a great way to have designated drivers feel like they're still participating. Like @all.equal.parts I too have a problem if they're too sugary, so this post of his really caught my attention.
***
 üçáüèòÔ∏èüå≥Long Way Home, a zero-proof cocktail to start the week. I'm not personally doing sober October, but I'm sure some of you are. So here is something to help you scratch that itch. I came up with this one almost two years ago for the @homebarawards. I'm still a sucker for a zero-proof drink that aren't syrupy sweet nonsense.
üå≥üèòÔ∏èüå≥
To be honest, that may be my biggest pet peeves in mixology: "mocktails" that are nothing but juice and syrup and make you think you are back in kindergarten slurping down an off-brand Sunny D. Creating a good mocktail doesn't have to be complicated. There are a lot of non-alcoholic spirits out there now that can be delicious when used properly. Even more, utilizing something other than tart and sweet ingredients can also help. In today's cocktail I used a lemon tonic from @fevertreemixers, which brings a bitter component. This drink is bright, refreshing, and full of lemon and blueberry deliciousness.
üèòÔ∏èüèòÔ∏èüèòÔ∏è
Recipe:
- 1 oz blueberry syrup
- 6 mint leaves
- 2 dashes orange blossom water
- 3/4 oz lemon sherbet
- 3 oz bitter lemon soda
ü•Ç
Add the mint, orange blossom water, and blueberry syrup to a tall glass. Gently muddle the mint. Add the lemon sherbet and about half the soda. Fill the glass 3/4 full with ice and swizzle. Add the rest of the soda and top with ice. Garnish with more mint.
ü•Çü•Çü•Ç
Glassware courtesy of @dcplateking
ü•Çü•Çü•Ç
Cheers
ü•Çü•Çü•Ç

I wanted to make a prosecco cocktail and I had peach syrup, but no puree or juice or anything that would make this "classy." ...I'm going to call it, "The Poor Man's Bellini"

2 pt peach syrup @monin_europe 
1 pt vodka
Fill with prosecco

Add syrup and vodka to a champagne flute. Swirl. Fill with prosecco. Garnish with a slice of peach.

#peach #vodka #champagne #prosecco #bubbly #cocktails #drinks #MixedDrinks #Mixology #HomeBartender #HomeMixology #HappyHour #cheers #sk√•l #Alcohol #liquor #liqueur #originaldrink #mydrink #Cocktailmaking #liqpic #ttcocktails #EmpireMixology #DelightfulDrinks #asthebarflies

This drink was inspired by a trip to a local restaurant. They call it a "Woo Woo" ...I assume that's because the ladyfolk who drink it tend to say "woo" a lot. ...I'm not ashamed to say I found it quite tasty!

2.0 pt vodka
3.0 pt cranberry juice
1.0 pt lime juice
1.0 pt peach syrup

Add ingredients over ice. Shake. Strain into a martini glass.

#WooGirls #vodka #VodkaCranberry #Peach @monin_europe #cranberry #cocktails #drinks #MixedDrinks #Mixology #HomeBartender #HomeMixology #HappyHour #cheers #sk√•l #Alcohol #liquor #liqueur

There's an amazing gin bar in Aarhus called "Two Socks" and I love going there! With the pandemic, that's been harder to get out so the innovative geniuses at @twosocksginbar devised a way to do in-home Gin & Tonic tasting. You place an order for one of their kits and they send you adorable bottles of gin, bottles of various tonics, tons of garnish, and a link to a video (it's in Danish, so English speakers beware (we just mimicked what they did and everything came out great!)) What's more, you even get two socks!! Swipe to the end to see the elegant @kegel_robbe model them.

This was a great deal economically, a fun way to support a local business, a wonderful exposure to different gins and tonics, and an overall splendid evening. Don't worry, they have two more sets, so we'll be back for more!

#gin #tonic #sampling #tasting #socks #lemonpeel #lime #sexygarnish #cocktails #drinks #MixedDrinks #Mixology #HomeBartender #HomeMixology #HappyHour #cheers #sk√•l #Alcohol #liquor #liqueur

Using the shrub that I posted on Wednesday, I made this delightful drink. I guess it's a little inappropriate to be posting summer drinks after the East Coast of the US got thwacked with snow, but maybe this 'Strawberry Pepper Sipper' will help melt your aching back!

1oz Strawberry pepper shrub
1oz lime syrup
1oz simple syrup
3oz gin

Add ingredients to ice. Stir. Strain into a glass of ice. Fill with seltzer. Garnish with a lime wheel.
